curam.util.transaction

Class TimerInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.util.transaction.TimerInfo

  • public final class TimerInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    A manager class for timed events.

    • Method Detail

      • startTask

        public static long startTask(long initialDuration,
                             long interval,
                             TimerTask task)
                      throws AppException
        Create an interval timer whose first expiration occurs after a specified duration, and whose subsequent expirations occur after a specified interval.
        Parameters:
        initialDuration - The Duration at which first expiration occurs.
        interval - The interval over which the timer repeats.
        task - A class containing information about the task to be timed.
        Returns:
        A unique id for the timer which got started.
        Throws:
        AppException - If the timer could not be started.

      • startTask

        public static long startTask(DateTime firstDate,
                             long interval,
                             TimerTask task)
                      throws AppException
        Create an interval timer whose first expiration occurs at a given point in time and whose subsequent expirations occur after a specified interval.
        Parameters:
        firstDate - The initial time at which first expiration occurs.
        interval - The interval over which the timer repeats.
        task - A class containing information about the task to be timed.
        Returns:
        A unique id for the timer which got started.
        Throws:
        AppException - If the timer could not be started.

      • startTask

        public static long startTask(DateTime firstDate,
                             TimerTask task)
                      throws AppException
        Create a single-action timer that expires after a specified duration.
        Parameters:
        firstDate - The time at which timer expiration occurs.
        task - A class containing information about the task to be timed.
        Returns:
        A unique id for the timer which got started.
        Throws:
        AppException - If the timer could not be started.

      • startTask

        public static long startTask(long duration,
                             TimerTask task)
                      throws AppException
        Create a single-action timer that expires at a given point in time.
        Parameters:
        duration - The duration to wait before executing the task.
        task - A class containing information about the task to be timed.
        Returns:
        A unique id for the timer which got started.
        Throws:
        AppException - If the timer could not be started.

      • getAllTimerIDs

        public static long[] getAllTimerIDs()
                             throws AppException
        Gets the identifiers of all active timers in the application.
        Returns:
        an array of identifiers of all active timers, or an empty array if none are present.
        Throws:
        AppException - if timer details cannot be accessed.

      • cancel

        public static void cancel()
                   throws AppException
        Cancels the timer which invoked the current method. Should only be called by methods which were invoked by a timer, calling this method from a non-timed will have no effect.
        Throws:
        AppException - if the timer cannot be cancelled.

      • isCancelled

        public static boolean isCancelled()
        Indicates whether this timer is cancelled.
        Returns:
        true if the timer is cancelled, false otherwise.

      • cancel

        public static void cancel(long timerID)
                   throws AppException
        Cancels the timer for the specified timer ID.
        Parameters:
        timerID - identifier of the timer to cancel.
        Throws:
        AppException - if the timer cannot be cancelled.

      • cancel

        public static void cancel(javax.ejb.TimerService timerService,
                          long timerID)
                   throws AppException
        Cancels the timer for the specified timer ID.
        Parameters:
        timerService - The timer service containing the timer to cancel.
        timerID - identifier of the timer to cancel.
        Throws:
        AppException - if the timer cannot be cancelled.

      • cancel

        public static void cancel(java.lang.String timerName)
                   throws AppException
        Cancels the timer(s) for the specified timer name.
        Parameters:
        timerName - name of the timer to cancel.
        Throws:
        AppException - if the timer cannot be cancelled.

      • getTimerDetails

        public static TimerTask getTimerDetails(long timerID)
                                 throws AppException
        Gets timer details for the specified timer ID.
        Parameters:
        timerID - identifier of the timer to get.
        Returns:
        TimerTask timer details for a specified timer ID.
        Throws:
        AppException - if the details cannot be obtained.

      • getTimerDetails

        public static TimerTask[] getTimerDetails(java.lang.String timerName)
                                   throws AppException
        Gets timer details for the specified timer name.
        Parameters:
        timerName - the name of the timer to get.
        Returns:
        the TimerTask timer details for all timers with the given name, or an empty array if none were found.
        Throws:
        AppException - if the details cannot be obtained.

      • getTimerDetails

        public static TimerTask getTimerDetails()
                                 throws AppException
        Gets the task details for the timer which is running the current thread.
        Returns:
        The timer task details if applicable, or null if this thread is not being run by a timer.
        Throws:
        AppException - if the task details cannot be obtained.

      • getID

        public static long getID()
                  throws AppException
        Gets the identifier for the timer which is running the current thread.
        Returns:
        The timer identifier if applicable, or zero if this thread is not being run by a timer.
        Throws:
        AppException - if the ID cannot be obtained.

      • isTimerTransaction

        public static boolean isTimerTransaction()
        Indicates whether the current transaction is being run by a timer.
        Returns:
        true if this is a timer transaction, false otherwise.
